sf_description: Kafka metrics. Created by SignalFx through service discovery.
Kafka metrics. Created by SignalFx through service discovery.

allPlotProgramText: find(refresh=300000,query='sf_metric:collectd.GenericJMX.kafka-all-bytes-in.counter AND sf_organizationID:##ORGID## AND NOT sf_metric:_*') -> fetch -> groupby('sf_source') -> stats:!max -> _SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_2=id -> publish(defaultSource='_SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_2',metric='_SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_2',sf_uiAnalyticsDerivedMetric=1,sf_uiHelper='##CHARTID##_2')

sf_viewProgramText: find(query='((plugin_instance:all)) AND (sf_metric:counter.kafka\\-bytes\\-in AND NOT sf_metric:_SF_PLOT_KEY_*)') -> fetch -> split -> stats:!mean -> _SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_4=id(report=1) -> groupby() -> sample(100) -> split -> publish(metric='_SF_PLOT_KEY_##CHARTID##_1_4',sf_uiAnalyticsDerivedMetric=1,sf_uiHelper='##CHARTID##_4')
